sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react' import ReactHtmlParser from "react-html-parser" import {Table, TdLeft, TdRight, PackDiv, Theader, Tbody, Body, Content, Td, ButtonCart } from '../PrestationElement' import ShoppingCartOrange from "../../../images/shoppingCartBlack.png" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useDispatch, connect } from "react-redux" import { addToBasket } from "../../../features/reducers/BasketSlice"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Category(props) { const { subActive, cat, index, handleSelection, active } = props; const [tabview, setTabview] = useState(false); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const history = useHistory(); const handleAddToBasket = () =>{ dispatch(addToBasket({ idCat: cat.subCategories[0].products[0].id, nameCat: cat.subCategories[0].products[0].name, priceCfaProduct: cat.subCategories[0].products[0].prixTTCCFA, priceEuroProduct: cat.subCategories[0].products[0].prixTTCCFA })) //history.push('/panier'); } return ( <>
{ cat.subCategories.map(subCat => ( <> { subCat.products.map((item, index) => (
setTabview(index)} key={index} key={index}>
{item.nomPrestation}
{ tabview === index ? ( <>
Présentation de :
la prestation
 {ReactHtmlParser(item.presentation)}
Fiche du produit :
SKU : {item.sku}
Type de Prestation : {item.type}
Catégorie : {item.categorie}
Sous Catégorie : {item.souscategorie}
Nature du livrable : {item.nomPrestation}
Délai d'éxecution estimé (en semaine) : {item.delai}
Prix TTC CFA : {item.prixTTCCFA}
Prix TTC Euros : {item.prixTTCEuroEnK}
) : '' }
)) } )) }
) }
